lyrics:
I was rollin in my car when I pull up at the mall
Couldn’t find a place to park
Threw my keys to the valet
I was only there to hang, wasn’t looking for a thing
I was just about to bounce
And then I saw Ms. Lady
Then I said to myself

There goes my baby (ooooh my)
There goes my destiny
Always was for me
There goes my baby
There goes my baby
She gone be the one
We gone fall in love
We gonna have some babies

She was come out the shoe store
Pretty little thing
A couple of bags in her hand
Right in front of Macy’s
Then I saw her at the food court sipping lemonade
Conversation on her cell phone
Looking so amazing
And I said to myself

There goes my baby (there she goes, there she goes)
There goes my destiny
Always was for me
There goes my baby
There goes my baby
Oooh she gone be the one
We gone fall in love
We gonna have some babies

She gone wear my ring
(She gone take my name)
Take her to the cook out
(Me and her gone hang)
Take her to my momma’s house
If she her hair done
See my cousin Carol
I’ll treat like queen, give her everything
She will be my girl till we old and gray
I knew from the moment that I saw her lovely
Lovely face

There goes my baby (yes i did)
There goes my destiny (my destiny)
Always was for me
There goes my baby
There goes my baby
Oooh she gone be the one (she gone be the one)
We gone fall in love (fall in love)
We gonna have some babies
(repeat)

Crazy, crazy crazy
It's blowin my mind
but you gimme some of your time ....
